name: Applied Data Collection
description: The principles of proper collection of data for statistical analysis, and techniques to adjust statistical analyses when these principles cannot be implemented. Topics include: relationships among variables, causal relationships, confounding, random sampling, experimental designs, observational studies, experiments, causal inference, meta-analysis. Statistical analyses using R.
prerequisites: STAB27H3 or STAB57H3 or MGEB12H3 or PSYC08H3 or STA221H1 or STA248H1 or STA261H1
